adrFormatAddress: 513 W 145th St a8, New York, NY 10031, USA

originalText.text:
Installed access control for us in less than a week. Quick response, attention to detail, fair pricing, professional and friendly service. My experience with ADA Security Systems has been top notch. I am very satisfied with our relationship thus far and see no reason that will change. Samuel from ADA Security Systems upgraded an existing alarm system in my warehouse, did a thorough check of my existing equipment with no hard sell to buy things I did not need, and connected me to their monitoring system.
When I called couple months later to report that i was getting a low battery indicator on my control panel, one of their guys was at my door in 30 minutes - problem replaced and solved in 5 minutes. That's service. It is clear ADA Security Systems take pride in their work and care a great deal about their customers.  No reason to look elsewhere if you need access control installed in Lower East.

originalText.text: He demonstrated exceptional knowledge and was incredibly pleasant to work with. Patient and understanding, he answered all my questions and skillfully installed the security system. I would not hesitate to use his services again and wholeheartedly recommend him to all my friends.

text.text: He demonstrated exceptional knowledge and was incredibly pleasant to work with. Patient and understanding, he answered all my questions and skillfully installed the security system. I would not hesitate to use his services again and wholeheartedly recommend him to all my friends.

originalText.text: ADA Security Systems Serviced security cameras at one of our locations in Harlem. 2 cameras were completely off and one we couldn’t see clearly. Got 2 technicians at 8 AM, by 10 AM both cameras were on again and the one we couldn’t see at changed to sharp bright image. Donny from ADA was very professional and taught me couple things and tricks I wasn’t aware of. Will be the company I will call to service our Cameras in Harlem.

originalText.text: He troubleshoot my problem over the phone. Extremely friendly and professional.  I have their number saved now - of course I will only call them if anything else comes up!

originalText.text: For the service, for prices, and for coming on thanks giving to repair our access control system, I am writing this review. But besides this review, for the help provided today, from today and on ADA will be the only company to service our security systems in all our buildings in New York.
